trans-unit.source: Provides design-time visual support for <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> controls.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控件提供设计时可视化支持。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDesigner> class provides the visual representation for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls at design time.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDesigner>类提供的可视表示形式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件在设计时。

trans-unit.source: It is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.PartDesigner> class and adds validation to verify that the associated control is a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control or derived type.
trans-unit.target: 派生自<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.PartDesigner>类并添加验证以验证关联的控件是否<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件或派生的类型。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDesigner> inherits a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.PartDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> property from its parent that is always set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDesigner> 继承<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.PartDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A>从始终设置为其父级的属性`true`。

trans-unit.source: This causes the visual design environment to generate a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control to hold a temporary copy of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> on the design surface; this copy is then persisted into markup.
trans-unit.target: 这将导致可视设计环境来生成<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>控件以容纳的临时副本<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>在设计图面，则此副本然后保存到标记。

trans-unit.source: If you override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.PartDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> property to return `false`, the visual design environment generates markup directly from the actual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: 如果你重写<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.PartDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A>属性以返回`false`，可视设计环境中的实际直接生成标记<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件。

trans-unit.source: Web Parts designers generally act much like regular control designers; the principal methods for setting design-time appearance derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: Web 部件设计器通常作用类似常规控件设计器;用于设置设计时外观的主体方法派生自<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>类。

trans-unit.source: Specifically, you can override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CompositeControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method to change the design-time markup associated with the control.
trans-unit.target: 具体而言，你可以重写<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CompositeControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>方法可以更改与控件关联的设计时标记。

trans-unit.source: You can likewise override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetErrorDesignTimeHtml%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml%2A> methods to handle errors and empty strings (""), respectively.
trans-unit.target: 你可以同样重写<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetErrorDesignTimeHtml%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml%2A>方法来处理错误和空字符串 ("")，分别。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows the interaction between a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control and its associated <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示之间的交互<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制和其关联<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDesigner>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control contains a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control from which the end user selects his or her birthday, a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> control to submit the selection, and a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> control to display a message on the user's birthday.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>控件从其最终用户选择他或她生日<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>控件以提交所选内容，和一个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>控件在用户的生日上显示一条消息。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDesigner> verifies that the associated control is of the expected type and then customizes the design-time rendering of said control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDesigner>验证关联的控件是否预期的类型，然后自定义此控件的设计时呈现。

trans-unit.source: Note that the visual customizations of the designer are visible only at design time, whereas those of the associated control are visible at both run time and design time.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，设计器中的可视化自定义项可见仅在设计时，而是关联的控件在运行的时和设计时可见。

trans-unit.source: All the methods overridden in this example derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> base class.
trans-unit.target: 在此示例中重写的所有方法都派生自<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>基类。

trans-unit.source: For other available members and their use, see <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 其他可用的成员和其使用，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDesigner" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDesigner" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control associated with this designer.
trans-unit.target: 与此设计器关联的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控件。

trans-unit.source: Binds the designer to a control and validates that the control is a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 将设计器绑定到控件并验证该控件是否为 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控件。
